## Brief introduction

Hello!  My name is [Dan Williams](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dan-williams-3011aa8/) and I'm
a research director and mechanical engineer that works for [Ansys Inc](https://www.ansys.com/)
in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.


### My professional background

If you are curious about what I've been up to over the years please visit my 
LinkedIn page. There is a link below and I do my best to keep it up to date.
